Constructor Detail

LoadGUI

public LoadGUI()
Method Detail

chooseTimetableFile

public static FileIO chooseTimetableFile()
Pops up a message and a file dialog prompting for a new timetable file. Then returns a FileIO object (null, if the action was cancelled)

chooseNetworkFile

public static FileIO chooseNetworkFile()

chooseTimetable

public static void chooseTimetable(Query qSys)
Wrapper to use chooseTimetableFile(). Will ask for the file and then set it in the query system.

alterNetwork

public static void alterNetwork(Query qSys,
                                boolean launchGUI)
Creates a Window with a textfield for each station in the network, so the user can add/change their full names. If launchGUI is set to true it will create a new GUI object once the alter network window has been closed.

chooseNetwork

public static void chooseNetwork(Query qSys)
Asks for a new network file. If it got one it asks until it receives a timetable file too. Once it has both it sets them in the query system
